channel.title: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]
channel.description:
I'm working on adding the Barrows to my server - the actual one that is on RS. It's coming along fine. However, I have the coordinate for the underground maze with the chest, but I can't find the coordinates for the tombs themselves?
Note: I am using a 317.
I just need the coordinates for one tomb. Then I can figure out the rest.
Or is it height level? Since the tombs are below ground...
>=(

item.title: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

I downloaded both the clients, can’t connect to their server. Downloaded the server source. Doesn’t work either. X3[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2009, 08:51:51 am[/size][hr]Found it! It is height!
For future refernece:

HeightLevel: -1
X: 3554
Y: 9713

(That will put you in Dharok’s tomb. Play around with the tele command to go to other ones. Just gotta go up and down the x and y axis a few squares.)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]

item.title: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Get WoehiseScape or PwnScape and do it then.

item.title: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

I think it’s height. On Deltascape, I dig on the mound, but nothing happens. Instead, the ghosts of the brothers are on on top of the mound. So I guess digging won’t work. Odd.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]

item.title: Need help with finding tomb cordinates [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I’m not going to bother to look for you, find it out yourself by downloading DeltaScape teleporting to the Barrows mini-game use the shovel and put coordinates on, you’ll find it easily then, also I think the height is the same as normal but I’m not sure.

Read full topic
